title: UK Leader Rishi Sunak Faces a Bruising Prime Minister’s Questions
description: The opposition’s lines of attack, starting with Mr. Sunak’s choice of home secretary and his wife’s wealth, gave a glimpse of where it sees vulnerabilities in the governing Conservatives.
dc:creator: Mark Landler
media:description: Keir Starmer, leader of Britain’s main opposition party, said Rishi Sunak’s choice of home secretary was a “grubby deal” that showed him to be “weak.”
